General.Name: Ozak Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS
General.Description: Ozak Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a real estate investment trust. It invests in the real estate markets of Turkey.  Ozak Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. was founded in 2008 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
